bug.title: Issue manually entering fishing spot coordinates

parg.st: If the "sync" icon isn't clicked after manually entering coordinates, the fishing spot's coordinates aren't updated accordingly.
1. Create a new, or edit an existing location
3. Manually enter coordinates (do not click the sync button)
5. In the edit location screen the coordinates are not correct
The add fishing spot screen should get and validate its coordinates from the TextView widgets, not the middle of the map.
If the coordinates are invalid, the user should see a dialog (this may already be implemented).
